info.title: BillingManagementClient
info.description: Billing client provides access to billing resources for Azure subscriptions.

get.description: Lists all billing accounts for a user which he has access to.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: May be used to expand the address, invoiceSections and billingProfiles.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get the billing account by id.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: May be used to expand the address, invoiceSections and billingProfiles.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: The operation to update a billing account.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Request parameters supplied to the update billing account operation.

202.description: Accepted. Billing account update is in progress.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Lists all invoice sections with create subscription permission for a user.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists the Payment Methods by billing account Id.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.
Error response describing why the operation failed.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: The operation to create a BillingProfile.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Request parameters supplied to the Create BillingProfile operation.

Location.description: Location URI to poll for result

Retry-After.description: Recommends the retryable time after receiving this.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: The operation to update a billing profile.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Request parameters supplied to the update billing profile operation.

202.description: Accepted. Billing profile update is in progress.

Location.description: GET this URL to retrieve the status of the asynchronous operation.

Retry-After.description: The amount of delay to use while the status of the operation is checked. The value is expressed in seconds.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists customers by billing profile which the current user can work with on-behalf of a partner.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: May be used to filter the list of customers.

parameters.name: $skiptoken
parameters.description: Skiptoken is only used if a previous operation returned a partial result. If a previous response contains a nextLink element, the value of the nextLink element will include a skiptoken parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.description: Skiptoken is only used if a previous operation returned a partial result. If a previous response contains a nextLink element, the value of the nextLink element will include a skiptoken parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls.

get.description: Lists products by customer id.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: May be used to filter by product type. The filter supports 'eq', 'lt', 'gt', 'le', 'ge', and 'and'. It does not currently support 'ne', 'or', or 'not'. Tag filter is a key value pair string where key and value is separated by a colon (:).

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get a customer's product by name.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists the billed and unbilled transactions by customer id for given start date and end date. Transactions include purchases, refunds and Azure usage charges. Unbilled transactions are listed under pending invoice Id and do not include tax. Tax is added to the amount once an invoice is generated.

parameters.name: periodStartDate
parameters.description: Start date

parameters.name: periodEndDate
parameters.description: End date

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: May be used to filter by transaction kind. The filter supports 'eq', 'lt', 'gt', 'le', 'ge', and 'and'. It does not currently support 'ne', 'or', or 'not'. Tag filter is a key value pair string where key and value is separated by a colon (:).

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists the billed and unbilled transactions by billing account name for given start and end date. Transactions include purchases, refunds and Azure usage charges. Unbilled transactions are listed under pending invoice ID and do not include tax. Tax is added to the amount once an invoice is generated.

parameters.name: periodStartDate
parameters.description: Start date

parameters.name: periodEndDate
parameters.description: End date

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: May be used to filter by transaction kind. The filter supports 'eq', 'lt', 'gt', 'le', 'ge', and 'and'. It does not currently support 'ne', 'or', or 'not'. Tag filter is a key value pair string where key and value is separated by a colon (:).

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists the billed and unbilled transactions by billing profile name for given start date and end date. Transactions include purchases, refunds and Azure usage charges. recipientEmailId.description: Email Id of recipient for transfer.

properties.description: Summary of update auto renew operation properties

endDate.description: The end date of this asset

BillingAccountProperties.description: The properties of the billing account.

address.description: The address associated with billing account.

billingProfiles.description: The billing profiles associated to the billing account. By default this is not populated, unless it's specified in $expand.

enrollmentDetails.description: The details about the associated legacy enrollment. By default this is not populated, unless it's specified in $expand.

departments.description: The departments associated to the enrollment.

enrollmentAccounts.description: The accounts associated to the enrollment.

BillingAccountUpdateRequest.description: The request properties of the billing account that can be updated.

billingProfileStatus.description: The status of the billing profile.

billingProfileStatusReasonCode.description: Reason for the specified billing profile status.

policies.description: The attributes associated with legacy enrollment.

EnrollmentPolicies.description: The attributes associated with legacy enrollment

reservedInstancesEnabled.description: The reserved instances flag for Enrollment

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

enrollmentAccounts.description: Associated enrollment accounts. By default this is not populated, unless it's specified in $expand.

department.description: Associated department. By default this is not populated, unless it's specified in $expand.

InstructionProperties.description: A billing instruction used during invoice generation.

amount.description: The amount budgeted for this billing instruction.

startDate.description: The date this billing instruction goes into effect.

endDate.description: The date this billing instruction is no longer in effect.

creationDate.description: The date this billing instruction was created.

BillingProfileCreationRequest.description: The request parameters for creating a new billing profile.

invoiceEmailOptIn.description: If the billing profile is opted in to receive invoices via email.

enabledAzurePlans.description: Enabled azure plans for this billing profile.

BillingProfileProperties.description: The properties of the billing profile.

invoiceEmailOptIn.description: If the billing profile is opted in to receive invoices via email.

currency.description: The currency associated with the billing profile.

enabledAzurePlans.description: Information about the enabled azure plans.

invoiceSections.description: The invoice sections associated to the billing profile.

status.description: The status of the billing profile.

statusReasonCode.description: Reason for the specified billing profile status.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

InvoiceSectionListWithCreateSubPermissio.description: Result of listing invoice section properties with create subscription permission.

value.description: The list of invoice section properties with create subscription permission.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

InvoiceSectionWithCreateSubPermission.description: Invoice section properties with create subscription permission.

billingProfileStatus.description: The status of the billing profile.

billingProfileStatusReasonCode.description: Reason for the specified billing profile status.

enabledAzurePlans.description: Enabled azure plans for the associated billing profile.

DownloadUrl.description: A secure URL that can be used to download a an entity until the URL expires.

expiryTime.description: The time in UTC at which this download URL will expire.

url.description: The URL to the PDF file.

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

target.description: The target of the particular error.

ErrorResponse.description: Error response indicates that the service is not able to process the incoming request. The reason is provided in the error message.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

invoiceDate.description: The date when invoice was created.

amountDue.description: The amount due as of now.

azurePrepaymentApplied.description: The amount of Azure prepayment applied to the charges. This field is applicable to billing accounts with agreement type Microsoft Customer Agreement.

billedAmount.description: The total charges for the invoice billing period.

creditAmount.description: The total refund for returns and cancellations during the invoice billing period. This field is applicable to billing accounts with agreement type Microsoft Customer Agreement.

freeAzureCreditApplied.description: The amount of free Azure credits applied to the charges. This field is applicable to billing accounts with agreement type Microsoft Customer Agreement.

subTotal.description: The pre-tax amount due. This field is applicable to billing accounts with agreement type Microsoft Customer Agreement.

taxAmount.description: The amount of tax charged for the billing period. This field is applicable to billing accounts with agreement type Microsoft Customer Agreement.

totalAmount.description: The amount due when the invoice was generated. This field is applicable to billing accounts with agreement type Microsoft Customer Agreement.

invoicePeriodStartDate.description: The start date of the billing period.

invoicePeriodEndDate.description: The end date of the billing period.

isMonthlyInvoice.description: Specifies if the invoice is generated as part of monthly invoicing cycle or not. This field is applicable to billing accounts with agreement type Microsoft Customer Agreement.

billingProfileId.description: The billing profile id this invoice belongs to.

billingProfileDisplayName.description: The billing profile display name this invoice belongs to.

purchaseOrderNumber.description: An optional purchase order number used for the invoice.

documents.description: List of documents available to download including invoice and tax documents.

subscriptionId.description: The subscription id this invoice belongs to.

Document.description: The properties of the invoice download.

ProductsListResult.description: Result of listing products. It contains a list of available products summaries in reverse chronological order by purchase date.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

displayName.description: The display name of the product.

lastChargeDate.description: The date of the last charge.

tenantId.description: The id of the tenant in which the product is used.

invoiceSectionId.description: Invoice section id to which this product belongs.

invoiceSectionDisplayName.description: Invoice section display name to which this product belongs.

billingProfileId.description: Billing Profile id to which this product belongs.

billingProfileDisplayName.description: Billing Profile display name to which this product belongs.

customerId.description: Customer id to which this product belongs.

customerDisplayName.description: Display name of customer to which this product belongs.

ValidateProductTransferEligibilityResult.description: Result of the product transfer eligibility validation.

isTransferEligible.description: Specifies whether the transfer is eligible or not.

ValidateProductTransferEligibilityError.description: Error details of the product transfer eligibility validation.

code.description: Error code for the product transfer validation.

details.description: Detailed error message explaining the error.

ProductTransferValidationErrorCode.description: Error code of the transfer validation response.

customerId.description: Customer id to which this product belongs.

customerDisplayName.description: Display name of customer to which this product belongs.

azureCreditApplied.description: The amount of any Azure credits automatically applied to this transaction.

billingCurrency.description: The ISO 4217 code for the currency in which this transaction is billed.

discount.description: The percentage discount, if any, applied to this transaction.

effectivePrice.description: The price of the product after applying any discounts.

exchangeRate.description: The exchange rate used to convert charged amount to billing currency, if applicable.

marketPrice.description: The retail price of the product.

pricingCurrency.description: The ISO 4217 code for the currency in which the product is priced.

servicePeriodStartDate.description: The date of the purchase of the product, or the start date of the month in which usage started.

servicePeriodEndDate.description: The end date of the product term, or the end date of the month in which usage ended.

subTotal.description: The pre-tax charged amount for the transaction.

tax.description: The tax amount applied to the transaction.

unitOfMeasure.description: The unit of measure used to bill for the product. For example, compute services are billed per hour.

units.description: The number of units used for a given product.

unitType.description: The description for the unit of measure for a given product.

marketplacePurchases.description: The marketplace purchases are free, allowed or not allowed.

reservationPurchases.description: The reservation purchases allowed or not.

CustomerPolicyProperties.description: The properties of a Customer's policy.

AvailableBalance.description: Latest available balance on Monetary Credit PI.

currency.description: The currency for the amount value.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

PaymentMethodProperties.description: The properties of the payment method.

currency.description: The currency associated with the payment method.

UpdateAutoRenewRequest.description: Request parameters to update auto renew for support product.

autoRenew.description: Request parameters to update auto renew policy a product.

display.description: The object that represents the operation.

resource.description: Resource on which the operation is performed: Invoice, etc.

operation.description: Operation type: Read, write, delete, etc.

OperationListResult.description: Result listing billing operations. It contains a list of operations and a URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: List of billing operations supported by the Microsoft.Billing resource provider.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

BillingRoleAssignmentPayload.description: The payload use to update role assignment on a scope

principalId.description: The user's principal id that the role gets assigned to

BillingRoleAssignmentListResult.description: Result of get list of role assignments

properties.description: The role assignment the caller has

BillingRoleAssignmentProperties.description: The properties of the a role assignment.

createdOn.description: the date the role assignment is created

name.description: the name of the role assignment

principalId.description: The user's principal id that the role gets assigned to

scope.description: The scope the role get assigned to

BillingRoleDefinition.description: Result of get role definition for a role.

properties.description: The role definition for a role.

BillingRoleDefinitionProperties.description: The properties of the a role definition.

BillingPermissionsListResult.description: Result of list billingPermissions a caller has on a billing account.

value.description: The list of billingPermissions a caller has on a billing account.

BillingPermissionsProperties.description: The set of allowed action and not allowed actions a caller has on a billing account

actions.description: The set of actions that the caller is allowed to do

notActions.description: The set of actions the caller is not allowed to do

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

category.description: Category of the agreement signed by customer.

acceptanceMode.description: The mode of acceptance for an agreement.

participants.description: Participants or signer of the agreement.

value.description: The list of transfer validation results.

productId.description: The product id for which this result applies.

ValidationResultProperties.description: The properties of the validation result.

Participants.description: Details about the participant or signer.

statusDate.description: The date when status got changed.

email.description: The email address of the participant or signer.

Action.description: the action the caller allowed to do

NotAction.description: the action the caller doesn't allowed to do

apiVersionParameter.name: api-version
apiVersionParameter.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. The current version is 2019-10-01-preview.
